title: Red list : threatened species 2019
summary: This bar chart has 22 columns on the x axis representing Threatened Species, and Number of species in each Threatened Species on the y axis.
The Number of species is appeared to be the highest at Threatened Species Flowering Plants and lowest at Threatened Species Green Algae.
There is a difference of 14938.0 between the maximum Threatened Species Flowering Plants and minimum Threatened Species Green Algae.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Threatened Species in the x axis and Number of species in the y axis.
The maximum Number of species 14938.0 is found at Threatened Species Flowering Plants and the minimum is found at Green Algae where Threatened Species is 0.0.
The highest Threatened Species Flowering Plants has 14938.0 more Number of species than the lowest Threatened Species Green Algae.
The Threatened Species Flowering Plants has the highest Number of species, followed by Fishes, and Molluscs. Down to the Threatened Species Green Algae which is the lowest.
Threatened Species Velvet Worms, and Red Algae have a similar Number of species that is 9.0.
The Threatened Species Flowering Plants tends to be 10.89 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Threatened Speciess, we get total 30178.0.
